column6:
-Great location in Kyle , quiet subdivision, friendly neighbors, 10min to Walmart. 35min to downtown.
-Concrete floors, high ceilings, spacious 3 bedroom house, perfect for a big family/group.
-Enjoy the sunset on the backyard patio deck with grill and outdoor seating
-No pets, very clean / neat property
-Entertainment includes 2 55in TVs for your pleasure (Netflix, Hulu, Firestick, AppleTV), wine, kids toys, and so much more.
column9: Big and beautiful and cozy home for large groups
